name: FuseAI
long_description: We're building a new agentic operating system to enable startups to automate their entire outbound sales motion with vertical AI agents. You can think of the platform as a consolidation of every tool your sales reps would need to close customers. We enable you to run your entire sales deal cycle through a simple AI-powered interface - enrich B2B contacts, find high-intent leads, and engage with clients in seconds.
one_liner: The only outbound sales software you will ever need.
